items.sentence: I have something very important to tell you.
I have to change the batteries in the radio.
Tom told me that his father had passed away.
Tom told me that you like to eat spicy food.
Tom took off his glasses and wiped his eyes.
Tom tried to kiss Mary, but she backed away.
Tom could hurt himself if he\'s not careful.
Tom could see Mary\'s house in the distance.
I wouldn\'t have let anything happen to Tom.
I\'d like to hire someone who speaks French.
I read an article about acid rain yesterday.
I remember the first time I heard this song.
I rode a horse for the first time yesterday.
Tom\'s parents were asleep when he got home.
Tom\'s unwillingness to help surprised Mary.
Try to look at it from Tom\'s point of view.
Tom accused Mary of lying through her teeth.
Tom advised Mary not to go there by herself.
Tom advised Mary not to leave her door open.
Tom already knows you want to quit your job.
